dr.xml
Class ContentRule

java.lang.Object
  dr.xml.ContentRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
XMLSyntaxRule
public class ContentRule
extends java.lang.Object
implements XMLSyntaxRule

A syntax rule to ensure that allows one to document arbitrary content.
